did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the Keeling, Rowe and Farish Families
1765-1877
did.abstract: Papers of the families of Virginia [Spotsylvania county?] consist of a copy of The Book of Common Prayer,with 11 pages documenting births (including slave births), kept by Rachel Keeling; also included are a report card from Bowling Green Female Seminary (1877), for Emma Farish, and a receipt for rooting rose slips.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Keeling, Rowe and Farish Family Papers, 1765-1877, Accession #11144, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was given to the Library by Mildred Sisson Atkins of Morgantown, West Virginia, on May 3, 1994.
